title: Friday The 13th [ADULT]
description:
Here are all the currently scanned Friday The 13th Comics. Based on the popular series of American slasher films featuring the unstoppable serial killer Jason Voorhees. Pack includes:

Avatar Issues:
Friday the 13th - Bloodbath 01-03
Friday the 13th - Fearbook 01
Friday the 13th - Jason vs Jason X 01-02
Friday the 13th Special 01
Jason X Special 01


Topps Comics Issues:
Jason Goes To Hell 01, 03 (Topps) (#2 not scanned)
Jason vs. Leatherface 01-03
Satan's Six 04 (Topps)


Wildstorm Issues:
Freddy Vs Jason Vs Ash 1-6
Friday the 13th 1-6
Friday the 13th - Abuser and the Abused
Friday the 13th - Bad Land 1-2
Friday the 13th - How I Spent My Summer Vacation 1-2
Friday the 13th - Pamela's Tale 1-2


I have included all of the variant covers produced by Avatar.

This pack comes with an ADULT rating as it contains scenes of extreme violence and gore.

Thanks to the Scanners and enjoy! But remember don't read them on your own or anywhere near Crystal Lake!!! :D



Released on http://ComicPirates.info
